record.id: field.name="biztime" and file.name="slocatalog" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: biztime
record.file.name: slocatalog

brief.brief: The amount of time, the starting time of which is calculated based on the End of business day buffer, for handling the Process Target until its final state.

detail.detail: The exact interval for handling the Process Target is calculated based on the specified work schedule and the End of business day buffer. For example, if the work schedule is from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm and the End of business day buffer is 3 hours, the interval starts from 8:00 am the next business day if a record is submitted before 2:00 pm whereas it starts from 8:00 am the business day after the next if the record is submitted after 2:00 pm.
The format for specifying the interval is dd hh:mm:ss. For example, 5 hours can be specified as 05:00:00 and 2 days and 3 hours can be specified as 2 03:00:00.
